summary: Bring the mad into your Skyrim with the king himself, turning all mudcrabs into KingRaven_
descriptionHtml:
Bring the king to your Skyrim experience.

[youtube]ohRClwYkO1g[/youtube]

Replaces the audio files for mudcrabs in combat to some of the best sound bites from the biggest name in the game, the king of mad himself. All you slovenly shitnerds stuck in the White River farming petty souls from mudcrabs will have to endure the verbal and physical abuse of the king because you forgot to ward, don't call missing, never buy dust even though the enemy team is Riki, Mirana, Bounty, Clinkz, and Weaver, and finally you're nothing.

[i]Install using NMM or ModOrganizer. If you're a dumpster pub who still does it manually, make sure the contents of the archive is in the Data folder.[/i]

[b]Upcoming Features[/b]
[list]
[*]Woof Daggius voice for wolves
[*]Big Mad shouts
[/list]
author: SirIsaacNewbton
